metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23132 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - negligible.
metadata.Description: During Zabbix installation from RPM, DAC_OVERRIDE SELinux capability is in use to access PID files in [/var/run/zabbix] folder. In this case, Zabbix Proxy or Server processes can bypass file read, write and execute permissions check on the file system level

criterions.comment: zabbix package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
